title: Drawing, Design for Four-Legged Cabinet with a Curtain, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Four-Legged Cabinet with a Curtain
medium: Pen and black ink on thin cream paper
markings: Watermark across verso bottom : ORIENTAL LINEN
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink, lower right of sheet: Height 2.6" / Width 2.2" / Depth 1.3"
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Rectangular cabinet with molded top and open front, raised on 4 scroll-like legs; three inside shelves, partly hidden behind curtain at right; potted plant atop cabinet.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Four-Legged Cabinet with a Curtain, 1900–05. Pen and black ink on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-217
